text: Denis Krivushkin (born 1978) is a Kazakhstani cross-country skier. He competed at the Winter Olympics in 2002 in Salt Lake City, and in Turin in 2006. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Cross- country skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Kazakhstani male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Kazakhstan Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2003 Asian Winter Games
title: Denis Krivushkin
